title: REST API specifications
keywords: openEHR, ITS, REST APIs, REST, API, RESTful, services

specifications.title: REST API Overview
specifications.summary: The overview of various aspects and requirements of openEHR REST APIs.
specifications.keywords: openEHR, ITS, REST APIs, REST, API, RESTful, services, headers, http

specifications.title: EHR REST API
specifications.summary: This specification describes service endpoints, resources, functions and operations as well as details of requests and responses that interacts with an openEHR EHR API in a RESTful manner.
specifications.keywords: openEHR, ITS, REST APIs, REST, API, RESTful, services, EHR

specifications.title: Query REST API
specifications.summary: This specification describes service endpoints, resources, functions and operations as well as details of requests and responses that interacts with an openEHR Query API in a RESTful manner.
specifications.keywords: openEHR, ITS, REST APIs, REST, API, RESTful, services, query, aql

specifications.title: Definition REST API
specifications.summary: This specification describes service endpoints, resources, functions and operations as well as details of requests and responses that interacts with the openEHR Definition API in a RESTful manner. Definitions includes Archetypes, Templates and Operational Templates (OPTs).
specifications.keywords: openEHR, ITS, REST APIs, REST, API, RESTful, services, definitions, resources, templates

specifications.title: Simplified Data Template (SDT)
specifications.summary: Simplified Data Template specification - a simplified data representation for committing data to the openEHR EHR.
specifications.keywords: JSON, REST, web template, commit, simplified data, TDS, SDT, ncSDT, simSDT, structSDT

specifications.title: REST API OpenAPI files
specifications.summary: The openEHR REST API specifications as OpenAPI Specification v3.0 files in YAML format.
